author: _TheMoralist
text: Fits good to ask these questions and ponder. Free will is the One creator giving us the choice to choose between right and wrong as opposed to being forced to do right or wrong then be unfairly rewarded/punished for it. Its not a game, there is infinite wisdom in the creation of mankind. We don't decide what the almighty should have or shouldn't have done though, that's not really our place, since we're not creators of the universe and all. We don't have any control over the Almighty's will, He created us with free will and we should be grateful fir that.
